name: Greek Pita Pockets
author: Saputo
summary: Filled with sausage, onion, Greek olives, wild mushrooms, spinach leaves, and feta cheese, these Greek pita pockets are served with a delicious lemon yogurt. Shared credit: Wisconsin Milk Marketing Board, Inc.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh baby spinach leaves, packed
⅔ cup Nikos® feta cheese crumbles
directions: In small bowl, stir together yogurt and lemon juice; set aside
In nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, cook sausage, stirring frequently and crumbling for 2 minutes
Add onion, olives, and mushrooms; cook 4 minutes more
Add spinach leaves and cook until wilted and sausage is fully cooked, about 1 to 3 minutes
Add eggs and cook, stirring constantly until almost dry
Remove from heat and stir in feta
Stuff each pita half with feta-egg mixture
